# 7.0 Docs

> Documentation for 7.0 Docs.

- [.NET 7 breaking change: XmlSecureResolver is obsolete](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/xml/7.0/xmlsecureresolver-obsolete.md): Learn about the .NET 7 breaking change in XML/XSLT where XmlSecureResolver was obsoleted and XmlSecureResolver.GetEntity unconditionally throws a runtime exception.
